charaepi_ch0212_00_banjiro/2301_1101_010:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking
around town when Benga called out to [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ].
charaepi_ch0212_00_banjiro/2301_1201_030:
I was walking through town and smelled
someone tough, so I decided to see who
it was!
charaepi_ch0212_00_banjiro/2301_1201_050:
you’ve probably been through all sorts of
stuff, huh?
charaepi_ch0212_00_banjiro/2301_1201_060:
Volcarona and I’ve battled a lot of strong
Trainers in Unova, so me too!
charaepi_ch0212_00_banjiro/2301_1201_070: I’ve gotten stronger, but it’s not enough.
charaepi_ch0212_00_banjiro/2301_1201_080:
I’m still not satisfied. I want to get even
stronger!
charaepi_ch0212_00_banjiro/2301_1201_100: That’s why I’m so excited to be on Pasio!
charaepi_ch0212_00_banjiro/2301_1201_110:
I can smell tough Trainers around every
corner!
charaepi_ch0212_00_banjiro/2301_1201_120:
I bet I can handle a lot more—more than
ever before!
charaepi_ch0212_00_banjiro/2301_0301_130: Do you have a goal in mind?
charaepi_ch0212_00_banjiro/2301_0401_140:
Yeah! Gramps has been asking me the
same thing!
charaepi_ch0212_00_banjiro/2301_0302_150:
What do you want to do once you’re
stronger?
charaepi_ch0212_00_banjiro/2301_1201_170:
And when I say Gramps, I mean Alder—
Unova’s old Champion!
charaepi_ch0212_00_banjiro/2301_1201_180:
At first, my goal was to beat Gramps’s
Volcarona.
charaepi_ch0212_00_banjiro/2301_1201_190:
But since training in Unova and coming to
Pasio, I’ve seen a whole new world!
charaepi_ch0212_00_banjiro/2301_1201_200: So now, my goal’s even bigger!
charaepi_ch0212_00_banjiro/2301_1201_210:
The bonds between Pasio Trainers and their
Pokémon can be powerful!
charaepi_ch0212_00_banjiro/2301_1201_220: If I keep pushing forward on Pasio...
charaepi_ch0212_00_banjiro/2301_1201_230:
I could go anywhere—as long as I have that
strong Trainer-Pokémon connection!
charaepi_ch0212_00_banjiro/2301_1201_240:
So, my goal now is to become strong
enough to explore the unknown!
charaepi_ch0212_00_banjiro/2301_1201_290:
The more we compete, the stronger we’ll
both become!
charaepi_ch0212_00_banjiro/2301_1201_300:
We’re gonna take on a lot more and see
who’s stronger!
